Course list Service is running !! Stopping TIME OUT More than 10 seconds You don\'t have enough money You must wait 10 seconds between 2 purchases Play ADE Facebook Save and Back Logout Other course (LFSA1106) Program (FSA13BA) Major (MajInfo13) Minor (Minmap13) Help
To launch the chrono, press the start/stop button.
If you wanna take a pause, push the pause button.
To spend the credit you earned, go to the shop via the store button.
To check your schedules, push the ADE button if you\'ve already registered courses in the settings.
If not, go to the setting and type your courses in the Courses list
To set your sport level, go in the Settings
To earn Procrastinacoins by moving, go in Sport
Logging in â€¦ Sport Sport Your sport level is : Your goal GraphicalMenu Delay between two sport break [min] Snooze value [min] Course codes can only contain alpha-numeric characters.
